entries.title: The Slow Death of Surveillance Capitalism Has Begun
entries.description: A European Union ruling against Meta marks the beginning of the end of targeted ads.

entries.title: Can’t Decide What to Do About Twitter? Here Are Some Options
entries.description: It’s not too late to move toward your ideal social media existence. You could opt for Mastodon or Post, or stay and hope things turn around.

entries.title: Digital Traders Want to Go Fish
entries.description: A network of trading platforms is restructuring the seafood industry and tackling waste.
